basic_info.description: I enjoy developing web applications using JavaScript (recently TypeScript) as a hobby. Since I'm a beginner, I would like to develop a lot of web apps in order to learn and improve my skills.

projects.title: Chat Service (working title)
projects.description: I am currently developing a chat service similar to Slack using Next.js, React, and Firebase.

projects.title: ubmarine Game Deluxe (improved version)
projects.description: This is my third project since I started programming. I modified a real-time online game that I was able to create through an N-Prep School course. Specifically, I added missile interception capabilities, improved the visual appearance, and included additional in-game items. I was honored to receive the Excellence Award in the N/S High School Division of N-Prep School.

projects.title: Chrome Dinosaur Game.
projects.description: This is my second project since I started programming. I took a Google Chrome game parody that I was able to create through an N-Prep School course and added my own twists to it. I included features such as the ability to return to the title screen during gameplay, a double jump, and the addition of a hard mode. It was my first time creating a game using JavaScript, and it was a lot of fun!

projects.title: Positive Monster
projects.description: This is the first project I created. It is a tool where you input a word, and it searches for antonyms for that word using Weblio. I wanted to embed it within the page using the iframe tag and make it capable of handling not only single words but also entire sentences for input.

experience.title: Local full-time high school
mainTech: Due to various circumstances, I transferred schools.
